meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the children returned home with their smuttiest clothes.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic's hands were the smuttiest after a long day of fixing cars.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics left the room looking its smuttiest, with paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The old chimney was the smuttiest part of the house, covered in years of soot.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hands were the smuttiest canvas, creating beautiful paintings with charcoal.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes were the smuttiest at the late-night show.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti on the wall was the smuttiest the town had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The gossip magazine featured the smuttiest stories about celebrities.
meanings.sent4: The internet forum had the smuttiest comments, filled with inappropriate content.
meanings.sent5: The TV show had the smuttiest scenes, making viewers uncomfortable with its explicit content.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of cleanliness or decency
meanings.sent1: The abandoned house on the corner looked the smuttiest on the block.
meanings.sent2: The cafeteria was the smuttiest place in the school, with food scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Despite her efforts, the child's room always ended up looking its smuttiest by the end of the week.
meanings.sent4: The alley behind the restaurant was the smuttiest area, filled with trash and debris.
meanings.sent5: The public restroom was the smuttiest place in the park, in need of a thorough cleaning.
